TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit StandardPrintController extends System.Drawing.Printing.PrintController

Docs.summary: Specifies a print controller that sends information to a printer.

remarks.format:
## Remarks <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument> 使用此类。
有关打印的详细信息，请参阅<xref:System.Drawing.Printing>命名空间概述。

MemberSignature.Value: public StandardPrintController ();
.method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor() cil managed
Public Sub New ()
public: StandardPrintController();

Docs.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

MemberSignature.Value: public override void OnEndPage (System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument document, System.Drawing.Printing.PrintPageEventArgs e);
.method public hidebysig virtual instance void OnEndPage(class System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument document, class System.Drawing.Printing.PrintPageEventArgs e) cil managed
Public Overrides Sub OnEndPage (document As PrintDocument, e As PrintPageEventArgs)
public: override void OnEndPage(System::Drawing::Printing::PrintDocument ^ document, System::Drawing::Printing::PrintPageEventArgs ^ e);
override this.OnEndPage : System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument * System.Drawing.Printing.PrintPageEventArgs -> unit

Docs.param: A that represents the document being printed.
A that contains data about how to print a page in the document.
Docs.summary: Completes the control sequence that determines when and how to print a page of a document.

remarks.format:
## Remarks <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.StandardPrintController.OnEndPage%2A> 之后立即调用<xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument>引发<xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument.PrintPage>事件。 如果在引发异常<xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument.PrintPage>的事件<xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument>，<xref:System.Drawing.Printing.StandardPrintController.OnEndPage%2A>不调用。
<xref:System.Drawing.Printing.StandardPrintController.OnStartPrint%2A> 创建<xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>发送到打印机的对象。 之后<xref:System.Drawing.Printing.StandardPrintController.OnStartPrint%2A>调用时，<xref:System.Drawing.Printing.StandardPrintController.OnStartPage%2A>方法设置<xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>到单个页面的图形对象。 <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.StandardPrintController.OnEndPage%2A>方法将清除<xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>对象，而<xref:System.Drawing.Printing.StandardPrintController.OnEndPrint%2A>方法释放该对象。
当<xref:System.Drawing.Printing.StandardPrintController.OnEndPage%2A>的打印上下文从调用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.PrintDialog><xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintingPermission>的<xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintingPermissionLevel.SafePrinting>是必需的。 打印到默认打印机需要<xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintingPermission>的<xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintingPermissionLevel.DefaultPrinting>。 所有其他调用此方法要求<xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintingPermission>的 <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintingPermissionLevel.AllPrinting>

Docs.exception: The native Win32 Application Programming Interface (API) could not finish writing to a page.
Docs.permission: 用于控制对打印机的访问。 相关的枚举： 。

MemberSignature.Value: public override void OnEndPrint (System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument document, System.Drawing.Printing.PrintEventArgs e);
.method public hidebysig virtual instance void OnEndPrint(class System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument document, class System.Drawing.Printing.PrintEventArgs e) cil managed

public: override void OnEndPrint(System::Drawing::Printing::PrintDocument ^ document, System::Drawing::Printing::PrintEventArgs ^ e);
override this.OnEndPrint : System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument * System.Drawing.Printing.PrintEventArgs -> unit

Docs.param: A that represents the document being printed.
A that contains data about how to print the document.
Docs.summary: Completes the control sequence that determines when and how to print a document.

remarks.format:
## Remarks <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.StandardPrintController.OnEndPrint%2A> 之后立即调用<xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument>引发<xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument.EndPrint>事件。 即使在打印过程中，引发了未捕获的异常<xref:System.Drawing.Printing.StandardPrintController.OnEndPrint%2A>调用。
<xref:System.Drawing.Printing.StandardPrintController.OnStartPrint%2A> 创建<xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>发送到打印机的对象。 之后<xref:System.Drawing.Printing.StandardPrintController.OnStartPrint%2A>调用时，<xref:System.Drawing.Printing.StandardPrintController.OnStartPage%2A>方法设置<xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>到单个页面的图形对象。 <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.StandardPrintController.OnEndPage%2A>方法将清除<xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>对象，而<xref:System.Drawing.Printing.StandardPrintController.OnEndPrint%2A>方法释放该对象。

Docs.exception: The native Win32 Application Programming Interface (API) could not complete the print job. -or- The native Win32 API could not delete the specified device context (DC).
Docs.permission: 用于控制对打印机的访问。 相关的枚举： 。

MemberSignature.Value: public override System.Drawing.Graphics OnStartPage (System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument document, System.Drawing.Printing.PrintPageEventArgs e);

.method public hidebysig virtual instance class System.Drawing.Graphics OnStartPage(class System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument document, class System.Drawing.Printing.PrintPageEventArgs e) cil managed
Public Overrides Function OnStartPage (document As PrintDocument, e As PrintPageEventArgs) As Graphics
public: override System::Drawing::Graphics ^ OnStartPage(System::Drawing::Printing::PrintDocument ^ document, System::Drawing::Printing::PrintPageEventArgs ^ e);
override this.OnStartPage : System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument * System.Drawing.Printing.PrintPageEventArgs -> System.Drawing.Graphics

Docs.param: A that represents the document being printed.
A that contains data about how to print a page in the document. Initially, the property of this parameter will be . The value returned from the method will be used to set this property.
Docs.summary: Begins the control sequence that determines when and how to print a page in a document.
Docs.returns: A object that represents a page from a .

remarks.format:
## Remarks <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.StandardPrintController.OnStartPage%2A> 立即之前调用<xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument>引发<xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument.PrintPage>事件。
<xref:System.Drawing.Printing.StandardPrintController.OnStartPrint%2A> 创建<xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>打印时使用的对象。 之后<xref:System.Drawing.Printing.StandardPrintController.OnStartPrint%2A>调用时，<xref:System.Drawing.Printing.StandardPrintController.OnStartPage%2A>方法设置<xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>到单个页面的图形对象。 <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.StandardPrintController.OnEndPage%2A>方法将清除<xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>对象，而<xref:System.Drawing.Printing.StandardPrintController.OnEndPrint%2A>方法释放该对象。

Docs.exception: The native Win32 Application Programming Interface (API) could not prepare the printer driver to accept data. -or- The native Win32 API could not update the specified printer or plotter device context (DC) using the specified information.
Docs.permission: 用于控制对打印机的访问。 相关的枚举： 。

MemberSignature.Value: public override void OnStartPrint (System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument document, System.Drawing.Printing.PrintEventArgs e);

Public Overrides Sub OnStartPrint (document As PrintDocument, e As PrintEventArgs)

override this.OnStartPrint : System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument * System.Drawing.Printing.PrintEventArgs -> unit

Docs.param: A that represents the document being printed.
A that contains data about how to print the document.
Docs.summary: Begins the control sequence that determines when and how to print a document.

remarks.format:
## Remarks <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.StandardPrintController.OnStartPrint%2A> 之后立即调用<xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument>引发<xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument.BeginPrint>事件。
<xref:System.Drawing.Printing.StandardPrintController.OnStartPrint%2A> 创建<xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>打印时使用的对象。 之后<xref:System.Drawing.Printing.StandardPrintController.OnStartPrint%2A>调用时，<xref:System.Drawing.Printing.StandardPrintController.OnStartPage%2A>方法设置<xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>到单个页面的图形对象。 <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.StandardPrintController.OnEndPage%2A>方法将清除<xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>对象，而<xref:System.Drawing.Printing.StandardPrintController.OnEndPrint%2A>方法释放该对象。
<xref:System.Drawing.Printing.StandardPrintController.OnStartPrint%2A> 验证打印机设置有效。

Docs.exception: The printer settings are not valid.
The native Win32 Application Programming Interface (API) could not start a print job.
Docs.permission: 用于控制对打印机的访问。 相关的枚举：
